website_summaries.verdict: It offers some nice features, but its big and might be more than some consumers need.
pros: Has removable parts for easy cleaning
Drain board has large opening for precise draining
cons: Its large design holds a lot of dishes, but it might be too bulky for limited spaces

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, sorta retro feeling...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized dish drainer. I can fit a large cutting board, pasta pot, and saute pan inside at the same time. It holds onto our mugs and glasses firmly. After several months of use it still looks brand new. All the pieces seperate and I throw it in the dish washer. It takes up all the room in my dishwasher when I clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathran

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid 3-Piece Dish Rack, Aqua Sky ...
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and organised. Quite decorative. The reason of 3 stars instead of 5 is the fact it is not made of high quality stainless steel. I bought one 4 years ago and it got rusted and took its place in the garbage. It can be the best if the quality is improvrd.
customer_reviews.author: Darbyvienna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny in my opinion. I live by myself & this is more than enough for my dish drying needs. Aesthetically pleasing & sturdy. Have been using it for a couple weeks & so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed with this. Nowhere does the description say that except the silver metal wire rack, the whole thing is plastic. And the actual drain board piece is flexible cheap plastic with no support under the center so water just pools there causing it to just sag without draining. For the price and the brand, I really expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Flicek

customer_reviews.title: Love the color; wish the design was better to accommodate glasses and stemware
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this drainer and bought it specifically for the color to match my kitchen. The silverware basket is nice and can be placed on either end. My only complaint is that the drainer is not well-designed for glasses and stem ware and there aren't very good pegs to place glasses over to dry them. the body of the drainer is also stainless steel and can be unforgiving to delicate dishes and bowl/plate edges; I have to set plates and bowls in very carefully to not chip the edges, which never was a problem in my previous rubberized drainer from Rubbermaid.
customer_reviews.author: Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't drain...after a year I'm replacing it
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous thing and I wanted to love it. But it is entirely flat and isn't tilted to drain. Because my sink has a tiny raised edge on it, it in fact drains backwards. The rim is very shallow, so it constantly leaks over. I propped it up to tilt the proper direction, but any cups etc. near the edge still drain over the side. We're not talking drips...we're talking pools. I've finally decided I don't need this everyday aggravation in my life and I'm replacing it with another. I bought it because of the brand name, but it definitely doesn't meet their usual standards for great design. Such a pretty thing though!
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Not Stainless but a good item
customer_reviews.text: The description is incorrect, the basket is not "Crafted from stainless steel", the one we just received is regular steel with some kind of coating. We've had two of these dish racks, the first was chrome plated. Needs to be elevated at one end to drain well, but holds a lot of stuff and stands up to a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Happy RV'er

customer_reviews.title: The older version was better quality. The tray under the rack is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very over priced. The older version was better quality. The tray under the rack is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this item, I just wish it had more of a slant for water to drain out. You have to wedge something underneath to prop it up to drain or else it just puddles in the middle and starts to stain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Really love this drying rack, I got this because I was tired of my cheap ugly plastic one being on the counter all the time and this on looks absolutely beautiful on the counter. The drain could be slightly better but just tip it when you’re done and the remaining water comes out of the tray. I see some people complaining about the size and the drain placement, but just make sure you’re reading all the details before buying and it shouldn’t be a problem! Works in my kitchen perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a dish basket for a while. I came across this basket which was designed well for the need to dry the dishes. I just wished they offered more colors like gray,or black. The water doesn’t drain own it’s own from the tray, that’s not big problem for me. Once the dishes are dry I stack them away. And clean the tray.Other than that it gets the job Done. The prices point of view of this was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Aftab

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t drain well
customer_reviews.text: The rack is very cute looking in my kitchen. However, it doesn’t drain well, the drain tray is flat and not at an angle so water just pools in the middle. Also, the utensil tray has one little hole to drain, so that doesn’t drain well either. I also wish the bottom drain tray would have been wider. You have the option of hanging cups on the side but then they drip on the counter and not the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Simpson

customer_reviews.title: I love the "retro" look
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a larger size drying rack system for my counter top. This was larger than most and was the perfect size. The lay-out is perfect for us, the plate rack and the end-mounted silverware holder. My only issue is that I have a top-mounted sink, so the lip of the drip tray is raised up resting on the sink. I had to put a spacer under the legs to make sure it angled correctly to drained into the sink.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Simple and straight forward dish rack with nice thicker steel. Got the aqua sky color which is so 50s it's great. Looks like my grandma's old one. Larger than I though it would be too. For what's out there and the price I paid on sale, I think it's a good deal. Wish the plastic was just a tad thicker, still feels very sturdy though but will see how long it hold up. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Towner

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid 3 -piece dish rack, aqua sky
customer_reviews.text: I love this dish rack. It is easy to clean and easy to use. It holds more dishes and pans than other dish racks and is sturdy. I use it every day. Great design for draining the water.
customer_reviews.author: Galatea Gillie

customer_reviews.title: Really wish it came in a different color HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: Best dish rack I've ever had. Large and flexible enough that I can put large cutting boards and even half-sheet pans in it. Easy enough to clean. Has a low profile so it doesn't leave my kitchen feeling cluttered. Directs water back to the sink; leaving the counter clean and dry. I just really wish it wasn't turquoise. Sigh. Black would have been nice; something less 60's-ish.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: this is the nicest dish drainer i have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: it really is a good design and very roomy. most drainboards don't hold many dishes but this one can handle multiple 12" inch skillets with lids with room for more! I even love the color! It is easy to tip water out of the drainboard into the sink, even when the sink has a raised rim around it.
customer_reviews.author: JR H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful retro dish dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's a beautiful color. I like that it's built low and has a retro look about it. When I received it it was just in the original box and didn't have extra padding so the back tray was cracked. I liked it so much I decided I wasn't going to send it back. I set it up right away and you can't see the cracked part of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J Young

customer_reviews.title: I have had a white drain tray the same make ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a white drain tray the same make etc. The only thing I don't care for is the black color has white areas that show up. My white colored one hid some of the hard water spots I now have with the black one :( :(
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Scharbrough

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding rack
customer_reviews.text: I’m fussy about my drying racks, this was the nicest one I ever had it’s thick and durable. The placement of dishes glasses and utensils are perfect. It fits conveniently on the counter and there’s a choice of colors. I considered spending that much money but it was a value.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Best dishrack EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best dishrack I've ever had. It's stylish (I've had many that were ugly and bent or got gross really quickly). This is easy to put together, versitle, easy to clean, and looks nice on the counter top. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nic TFu

customer_reviews.title: Durable and big enough to hold my dishes
customer_reviews.text: Replacing one that was almost 10 years old. Issue with so many others is they are too small, unwieldy, or just not sturdy. This one lasts and lasts. When you do your dishes by hand, you need something large enough, yet won't eat up counter space, to hold your dishes. This one does that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. But it was not so bad as to make it unusable so I kept it. I do like it but there’s no easy way to clean the flat base pare.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy S.

customer_reviews.title: well made, attractive especially for a dish rack!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to resort to a dish rack but always have a few hand-washed items on a drying pad and tired of it. This is probably the nicest dish rack I have ever seen or used. It is attractive (for a dish rack) and well made; I am happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Dorman

customer_reviews.title: what you need to know
customer_reviews.text: the design does not allow for easy run off, there for the water stands and over time causes an unsightly stain. My recommendation would be to raise one end slightly which keeps the water on the run. thank you for listening this is my 2nd 3 piece dish rack, I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: One of the Worst Purchases
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but that's all it is. Less that a year in, there was a crack in the powder coating and the rust has been spreading. The tray doesn't tilt so the water just sits there. I have to put something on one side to tilt it torwards the sink. Piece of junk and I waited to too long to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: Simone E.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this mostly for color, but it has ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly for color, but it has many design flaws. The end that requires the sink is too far from the silverware bin and when full of dishes you cant see where to put the silver, as it is totally hidden. It also has to be propped up on one end because it doesn't drain. Also, the bottom cannot be removed to be cleaned. If you try, it will break.
customer_reviews.author: karyn h

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not very functional
customer_reviews.text: The grooves where plates should go are not deep or tall enough. Plates continue to fall over and it’s very hard to get them to stay in place. I’ve had several instances where the plates fall and knock everything off of the dish rack. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but better for thinner or smaller plates
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and handy but works better if you don't have big thick plates. My dinner/lunch fiestaware plates can basically only lay flat across the top or press against each other while leaning on something else as the slots aren't tall enough to actually hold them up, works great for the small plates and cups though and the silverware holder it very useful :)
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Finally a dish rack big enough
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd dish rack I bought, I feel like I finally found one that can hold more then a few cups. I also like that it comes apart so you can clean in thoroughly when it gets yucky. As always, love the kitchenaid blue which my kitchen is full of!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian M

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and color of this And there’s a lot of space the only thing I don’t like about it is the glass holders it seems like they don’t hold taller glasses very good and the silverware holder is a little bit hard to clean to get into the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dish Drainer
customer_reviews.text: This dish drainer is great, it has lots of room for everything and so ease to clean up when it needs it. Goes beautifully with my Pioneer Woman stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Look at dimensions
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit bigger than I expected, but that's not necessarily bad. Holds way more dishes than average dish dry rack. The wife loves the retro look and color. A bit pricey, but it's pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and very functional.
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my kitchen and matches my kitchen aid mixer. Holds a good amount of dishes. Arrived broken the first time and they immediately replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking but...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking dish pan! In fact, best looking one we've ever owned. Unfortunately, after a few uses we noticed RUSTING in the corners. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Teatzar

customer_reviews.title: annoying to clean
customer_reviews.text: the water doesn't drain on its own. some of it will drain thru the side but most of the water sits there. you have to clear all the plates after they air-dry and then remove the rack to wipe it dry or else it'll be grimey
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Large, durable dish rack
customer_reviews.text: The best dish drying rack I’ve ever used. This is actually my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: It is huge!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is MUCH bigger than it looks in the photo. It does not fit on my counter. Water drains out both sides so I have to prop up one. I would return this monstrosity but it is not worth the hassle to me. Currently sitting on a storage cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bird

customer_reviews.title: Oversized and durable
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this dishrack as it holds way more plates and utensils than my old one and can actually hold a pot as well as the dishes and cups because it’s wider. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a large dish rack and this was the only one that had the features I was looking for, and was actually large in size. Based on the other reviews, I propped up the back end slightly and the water seems to be draining from the board just fine. I would have preferred a choice of other colors but other than that, I am very satisfied with this product thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for the most part, I’m really just being nit picky. It has plenty of space and it’s easy to dismantle for cleaning. The drip tray doesn’t have as much of an incline as I’d like, and it’s a bit flimsy. If the tray was more rigid and inclined more it’d be a five star across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Great Dish Drainer
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Is the perfect color and made well. Love the design too. Have no problem with heavy pots and pans and large items.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I had been trying to find a replacement for my previous Kitchen Aid Dish rack at the local stores, but they were all small and I was not satisfied with the one I ended up buying. I bought this one after hesitating because of the price. I'm glad I bought it. Most of the time we always have a big stack of dishes to wash since we're a big household, so the bigger size is a big plus. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica H.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got the product fast and it’s perfect! Large size and great color to match kitchenaid blender. Definitely recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this dish rack. I had a red one but the hard water in our area finally took its toll on it. It was still in great shape though. I love this color and the price was too good to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dish rack ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful retro dish rack that is well designed, spacious, and drains well. I got an extra just to have in the future, in case they stop making it. Love the color and the lines!
customer_reviews.author: Hendle

customer_reviews.title: Exact Color Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Matched perfectly with my retro kitchen theme color. It is larger than the picture which is perfect for my counter top. Fast shipping was great too !
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big dish rack
customer_reviews.text: I ❤️❤️ It. It’s really sturdy not some cheap plastic. Easy to clean. It’s pretty big. It can fit lots of pots and plates. It’s wide too. The only thing is this took about a month to be delivered. Other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melly Mclamb

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice but
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy and works well but its super hard to clean due to the plastic bottom being screwed onto the metal wired part. The water does NOT drain easily even when i tried to prop it up leaving a gross residue (since the water in my area is hard).
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen L.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and you and switch which side you want the water run off to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year. Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year of use. poorly designed and water gets stuck and doesn't drain out. Finally fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Shredman

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of dishes and has 4 sections to put silverware
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous model that was difficult to clean. This model lets you remove under tray for cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Christine Brems

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be propped up for water to drain
customer_reviews.text: This is very roomy. You can pile it high with all your dishes, pots, glasses etc. The first one lasted 5 years and became rusty. I bought another, as none compare!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Senger

customer_reviews.title: Tray not big enough
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Although the tray is not wide enough to capture the cup/glass water draining. This leaves water spots in my granite counter. Otherwise the look is ok. Also I prefer the spoon tray towards the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it great product nice color looks great in my kitchen. Has a very retro 50s or so Style really nice seriously looks like something my mom had back in the day .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Will not drain water due to a flimsy tray. Wrote Kitchen Aide twice and they wanted me to send back the defective part for replacement. Again useless. Not going to spend my $ to ship to get back the same thing that plain does not work. When I responded telling them this, they never bothered to reply back. Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love the dish drainer, it's big, wish another color, but can't find this one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: akirkelie

customer_reviews.title: 5years with 1st one. Hope to get  another 5yrs more.
customer_reviews.text: This our sevond time buying this brand. I love it. It has lasted me for a long time. Grest product for my dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G.

customer_reviews.title: Drainage
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to drain the water out wish it had been tilted anyone know what to use to tilt it???????
customer_reviews.author: Carlene C.

customer_reviews.title: The best dish drainer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until this dish drainer went on sale. I was very happy with this product. It’s very sturdy, durable and functional. I do A LOT of dishes daily and it holds a lot of them at any given time. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Avila

customer_reviews.title: So pretty though wish I could have kept
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately had to return because it was bigger than expected my fault. So pretty though wish I could have kept it
customer_reviews.author: Frenchiemama

customer_reviews.title: well made an won”t disappoint !!
customer_reviews.text: was really pleased !!! love the look made well !! very eye catching 👍
customer_reviews.author: Aj  strong

customer_reviews.title: Finally I found a kitchen rack I love!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the size, the separate utensil holder, and easy to clean. It is strong and holds a lot of dishes! All positive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: The color is amazing. Retro but fits well in my kitchen. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rewis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 9 months ago and the now the tray is broken, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: yusra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ounce of color in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easiest to clean but it is very easy to organize. Set up. Use and it looks nice. It has a spot for everything while it’s drying.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for to replace our old rusted one. Large size and holds a lot of dishes. Our old one lasted many years. This has better coating so it should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: It is very rough for me to clean this dish rack fine tooth comb. I wish that it was easy to remove some of the parts to clean. $35 is too expensive to replace a dish rack like this. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: hellokittyky

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! The look it’s perfect and fits perfectly on my counter
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Functional while great on design
customer_reviews.text: I Love it! Match’s my decor beautifully. It’s designs allows you to be able to keep it out and not having to put it away after use. I am a person who likes limited things on counters however, I do not object to having this sit on my granite by my sink.
customer_reviews.author: SamiJoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooks to put pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Great strength to hold up my post and pans etc. Love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had one years ago and lost it in a move. I was thrilled to find it on here. It's a plus for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: KelleyB

customer_reviews.title: Significantly cuts down on a soggy mess when washing dishes ...
customer_reviews.text: Significantly cuts down on a soggy mess when washing dishes and even increases productivity by allowing me to wash more before pausing to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: BIG!!
customer_reviews.text: This drain is very big. Great color and holds a lot of dishes and pots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dish rack
customer_reviews.text: Replaced one that I already had, I love this dish rack
customer_reviews.author: brittanyterlaje

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this dish rack at a friend's home and had to have one for myself. I love the retro look and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Candace A. Owen

customer_reviews.title: I really love this dish rack
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dish rack. It's different from the usual look. Very functional and looks great on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: Great but silverware holder difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this overall, but wish the silverware holder was easier to clean. That part tends to get slimy every few days and it is difficult to clean the bottom since the dividers are not removable.
customer_reviews.author: M Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Take into account the sink might not be flush to the counter.
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen sink has a raised border around the sink and I had to make-shift lift so it would drain. Otherwise I really like the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a dish drainer to allow me to do all our dishes by hand while our dishwasher was broken. This model is well-suited to handling a large number of plates and flatware. No rust at all so far, and I have used it daily for about two months. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: how to remove tray and adjust drip spout
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far - unsure of how to remove the drip tray or adjust the drip spout - no directions - don't want to break it by trying - anyone have some help - thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Zep

customer_reviews.title: This color is goregeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: this product came quickly, not damaged and will look great in my new kitchen and the price was cheaper than I found at a different store
customer_reviews.author: Monica V

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT RUST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase ! BEST dish rack I ever bought....coated so WILL NOT RUST!! PRICE high compared to other dish racks....but WORTH IT▪▪▪
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: I love the product overall but one issue is the water comes out at the other end just as some have mentioned so I added something to raise it to prevent the spill.
customer_reviews.author: flopdx

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This KitchenAid 3-piece Dish Rack is absolutely amazing. It is very sturdy and exactly what I imagined it would be. I love it and wish I could order it in every color. Also, delivery time was just as promised, coming a few days early. AMAZON, YOU ROCK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Extra Large Dish Rack
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality and the color. Very nice. It is brand new to me so I have no complaints, but if it does have any drainage issues, as some people complained, you can just prop up one end a little bit. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Carbon Copy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the color tied in with all my other kitchen utensils.
customer_reviews.author: A queen 👸🏽

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s pretty and easy to clean... holds more dishes than I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: L. Meditz

customer_reviews.title: Hold many dishes
customer_reviews.text: I like that it hold a lot of dishes. The water leaks on to the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Wi

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found The Right Color!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dish rack. I redesigned my kitchen for a more 1950s look and this was the perfect color! I looked everywhere and finally I found this KitchenAid dish rack in Aqua Sky. So happy!!
customer_reviews.author: WitchyMama

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hold lots of stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought it immediately after I saw it in my friend’s home. It is big and hard enough to hold lots of dish and bowl and fork and knives. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: fancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LIke these dish racks just with there were other colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality KitchenAid product
customer_reviews.text: Right color, right size. Completes my 1950s retro kitchen colour scheme.NOTE: it's pricey.
customer_reviews.author: s. w. bunyan

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: i love the design and color its looks elegant in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Large useful rack
customer_reviews.text: Can mix all types of items in one rack and large enough to do so
customer_reviews.author: robert chaillou

customer_reviews.title: Great design and look
customer_reviews.text: The best dish rack we ever had. Great design and quality material
customer_reviews.author: Honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Unpractical and very difficult to maintain clean
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nightmare to clean since the tray doesn’t remove easily. In for months, rusty appears in some places...
customer_reviews.author: Yoleida Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Well made simple dish rack.
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and simple design. Cool retro color. Good size for standard kitchen. Drains well. Plenty of room for the dishes made by 2 adults and 2 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of space. I love it. The only downfall is that the bottom is difficult to clean. It’s hard to get your hands under the grates to clean the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: LMC1787

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Base could be a bit wider than the actual rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KitchenAid 3-Piece Dish Rack, Aqua Sky
product_meta.description:
Color:Aqua SkyFor decades, KitchenAid has created innovative products for the well equipped kitchen. The KitchenAid 3 Piece Dish Rack will keep your dishes organized and safe as they dry. Crafted from stainless steel, the basket has tons of room for dinnerware and cookware. The detachable caddy is the perfect place to store flatware and all your kitchen tools. The self draining board has a wide mouth which ensures proper drainage. 
One year hassle free replacement and lifetime limited warranty. This fine product is warranted to be free from defects in material and workmanship. For one year from date of purchase, under normal use and care, KitchenAid will replace these products free of charge, if they are found to be defective in material or workmanship. In addition, from year two through the life of the products, any piece found to be defective under conditions of normal use and care will be repaired at no charge or replaced with the same item or an item of equal or better value.
feature_bullets: Large Dish Rack for Storage and Drying: This high capacity disk rack features a large tray that can store dishes, pots, and pans to dry
Removable Self Draining Board: The self draining board is removable for multi purpose use
Side Caddy for Silverware: The disk rack features a detachable side Caddy that will keep your flatware and other kitchen tools upright while drying
Flexible drain spout: The drain spout can be set in multiple positions
Easy to Clean: All parts are removable and easy to hand wash when needed; This dish rack comes with a 1 year hassle free replacement and lifetime limited warranty
